api_list.api_description: Query interface for searching arXiv articles.

optional_parameters.name: search_query
optional_parameters.description: Search terms used for the query.

optional_parameters.name: max_results
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

api_list.api_description: Perform a count on a data request.

optional_parameters.name: starttime
optional_parameters.description: Limit events on or after the specified start time.

optional_parameters.name: endtime
optional_parameters.description: Limit the events on or before the specified end time.

optional_parameters.name: minmagnitude
optional_parameters.description: Limit to events with a magnitude larger than the specified minimum.

query: Retrieve the latest three papers on the topic of my latest groundbreaking research from arXiv and count the number of earthquakes with a magnitude above a certain level that happened before the piano concert.
